info.author: Matthew J Morrison
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
pycrap is a Python module that provides a command line
tool to create Change Risk Analysis and Prediction or
C.R.A.P. reports. 

To read about the CRAP metric check out this article:
http://www.artima.com/weblogs/viewpost.jsp?thread=215899
info.name: pycrap
info.summary: A Python code Change Risk Analyzer and Predictor (a.k.a. CRAP)
info.html_description:
pycrap is a Python module that provides a command line tool to create Change Risk Analysis and Prediction or C.R.A.P. reports.

To read about the CRAP metric check out this article: http://www.artima.com/weblogs/viewpost.jsp?thread=215899
